data.fullContent: The show follows Ben Wheeler, a single bartender in his twenties who lives in New York City. A one-night-stand, whom he had forgotten about, leaves her baby at his doorstep. He later finds out that the baby is his daughter, Emma. Ben decides to raise Emma with the help of his brother, Danny, his two close friends, Riley and Tucker, and his mother, Bonnie.
data.answer: 本·惠勒(Ben Wheeler)是一位住在纽约的20多岁的单身酒保。一个他已经忘了的一夜情对象，把她的孩子留在了他的门口。后来他才知道孩子是他的女儿，艾玛。本决定在哥哥丹尼、两个密友莱利和塔克以及母亲邦妮的帮助下抚养艾玛。
